title: Media Faction

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value:
Eliminate all who aren't social media addicts.
*TWEEEEEEET*
**Twitter** (Media Killing)
Attack: Unstoppable
Defense: None

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You select two people.
- The coming night, both will have a private chat opened.
- You will decide a subject to have them debate on.
- Whoever the host deems does worse in the debate will be attacked.
Post 3758
*I use for the filters.*
**Snapchat** (Media Killing)
Attack: Overkill
Defense: None
Abilities: Ghost two people.

fields.name: Goal (cont.):
fields.value:
Attack: None
Defense: None
Abilities: Kick someone out of tomorrow's channel.
Attributes:
- Your target will be booted from tomorrow's day chat.
- They can still vote and whisper, but do not have access to the chat itself (deaths, messages, etc.)
Post 3761
*An excuse to binge videos!*
**YouTube** (Media Support)
Attack: None
Defense: None
Abilities: Force someone to watch a video.
Attributes:
- You can select a less than 25 minute long YouTube video.
- You select during the day.
- The host will give the video to your target.
- Your target will be super-roleblocked.
- Your target will continue to be super-roleblocked until they watch the video and give a summary.
